name: volt-absorb

effect.sun_moon: Does not absorb non-damaging electric moves, i.e. thunder wave.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Does not absorb non-damaging electric moves, i.e. thunder wave.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Does not absorb non-damaging electric moves, i.e. thunder wave.

short_effect: Absorbs electric moves, healing for 1/4 max HP.

flavor_text.sun_moon: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move, instead of taking damage.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move, instead of taking damage.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move instead of taking damage.
